0.1.name: wordpress/basic-google-analytics
0.1.description:
A no-frills plugin that adds the Google Analytics tracking code to your Wordpress site.

Features

  1. Option for placing the code in the header or footer.
  2. Option to customize the default Google Tracking code snippet.
  3. Option to add the Google Webmaster Tools Site verification meta tag.

Please, report bugs to michael@mjkjr.com
